trans-unit.target: Set up a new authentication method

trans-unit.target: Set up your first authentication method

trans-unit.source: You currently do not have any authentication method set up. Start by selecting your preferred type:
trans-unit.target: You currently do not have any authentication method set up. Start by selecting your preferred type:

trans-unit.source: You currently do not own any tokens, nor can you set up a token yourself. Please contact your administrator.
trans-unit.target: You currently do not own any tokens, nor can you set up a token yourself. Please contact your administrator.

trans-unit.source: Please select which token to use as your second factor:
trans-unit.target: Please select which token to use as your second factor:

trans-unit.source: You do not own any valid tokens or there was a problem retrieving them from the server. Please contact an administrator.

trans-unit.note: login page second factor cancel button
login page second factor submit button

trans-unit.source: The OTP field cannot be empty
trans-unit.target: The OTP field cannot be empty

trans-unit.source: Test successful. You may use your token for authentication.
trans-unit.target: Test successful. You may use your token for authentication.

trans-unit.source: Enter the next OTP value for the selected token:
trans-unit.target: Enter the next OTP value for the selected token:

trans-unit.source: Scan the QR code with your LinOTP Authenticator app:
trans-unit.target: Scan the QR code with your LinOTP Authenticator app:

trans-unit.source: Waiting for confirmation of transaction via your LinOTP Authenticator app.
trans-unit.target: Waiting for confirmation of transaction via your LinOTP Authenticator app.

trans-unit.source: Enter your token PIN or password if you have set a PIN or you are required to enter your password for OTP authentication:
trans-unit.target: Enter your token PIN or password if you have set a PIN or you are required to enter your password for OTP authentication:

trans-unit.source: In the next step your Authenticator app will be verified by the authentication server.
trans-unit.target: In the next step your Authenticator app will be verified by the authentication server.

trans-unit.source: In the next step your Authenticator app will receive a test challenge.
trans-unit.target: In the next step your Authenticator app will receive a test challenge.

trans-unit.source: Please confirm the challenge on the app.
trans-unit.target: Please confirm the challenge on the app.

trans-unit.source: If you are not sure whether your app is compatible, you will later have the possibility to test the token. Should the test fail, you can install another app and try again.
trans-unit.target: If you are not sure whether your app is compatible, you will later have the possibility to test the token. Should the test fail, you can install another app and try again.

trans-unit.source: Once you have an app installed on your device, you can start the setup process.
trans-unit.target: Once you have an app installed on your device, you can start the setup process.

trans-unit.source: Before you proceed you may set a token description, which should help you identify your token:
trans-unit.target: Before you proceed you may set a token description, which should help you identify your token:

trans-unit.source: Waiting for confirmation for test transaction via Authenticator app.
trans-unit.target: Waiting for confirmation for test transaction via Authenticator app.

trans-unit.source: Waiting for confirmation for transaction via Authenticator app.
trans-unit.target: Waiting for confirmation for transaction via Authenticator app.

trans-unit.source: Scan the QR code below with the Authenticator app to activate your token:
trans-unit.target: Scan the QR code below with the Authenticator app to activate your token:

trans-unit.source: Scan the QR code below with the Authenticator app to confirm test transaction :
trans-unit.target: Scan the QR code below with the Authenticator app to confirm test transaction :

trans-unit.source: Activation failed. Please try again, or contact an administrator.
trans-unit.target: Activation failed. Please try again, or contact an administrator.

trans-unit.source: Test failed. Please try again, or contact an administrator.
trans-unit.target: Test failed. Please try again, or contact an administrator.

trans-unit.source: The activation was successful. Your token is ready to be used.
trans-unit.target: The activation was successful. Your token is ready to be used.

trans-unit.source: The test was successful. Your token is ready to be used.
trans-unit.target: The test was successful. Your token is ready to be used.

trans-unit.source: A token with the serial number has been created.
trans-unit.target: A token with the serial number has been created.

trans-unit.source: Scan the QR code below with your soft token app or follow this link to install it on your mobile device.
trans-unit.target: Scan the QR code below with your soft token app or follow this link to install it on your mobile device.

trans-unit.source: If you wish to set a security PIN, please do so now:
trans-unit.target: If you wish to set a security PIN, please do so now:

trans-unit.source: Generate two OTP values and enter them below:
trans-unit.target: Generate two OTP values and enter them below:

trans-unit.source: There was a problem with this token and it cannot be used. Make sure to delete it and reset your Authenticator app before enrolling a new push token.
trans-unit.target: There was a problem with this token and it cannot be used. Make sure to delete it and reset your Authenticator app before enrolling a new push token.

trans-unit.source: This token needs to be paired with your mobile. You need the enrollment QR code to proceed in the authenticator mobile application. Afterwards you can start the activation here.
trans-unit.target: This token needs to be paired with your mobile. You need the enrollment QR code to proceed in the authenticator mobile application. Afterwards you can start the activation here.

trans-unit.source: This token is paired with your mobile. The next step is the activation:
trans-unit.target: This token is paired with your mobile. The next step is the activation:

trans-unit.source: An activation challenge has been generated. Please process it with your Authenticator app.
trans-unit.target: An activation challenge has been generated. Please process it with your Authenticator app.

trans-unit.source: Setting a PIN helps you protect your token against misuse.
trans-unit.target: Setting a PIN helps you protect your token against misuse.

trans-unit.source: You need the Authenticator app installed on your mobile device to use this kind of token. You can get the app here:
trans-unit.target: You need the Authenticator app installed on your mobile device to use this kind of token. You can get the app here:

trans-unit.source: Once you have the Authenticator installed on your device, you can set a description for your new token and start the enrollment process:
trans-unit.target: Once you have the Authenticator installed on your device, you can set a description for your new token and start the enrollment process:

trans-unit.source: The token description should help you identify the token at a later point. It could, for example, refer to its usage scenario.
trans-unit.target: The token description should help you identify the token at a later point. It could, for example, refer to its usage scenario.

trans-unit.source: A token with the serial number (description: ) has been created.
trans-unit.target: A token with the serial number (description: ) has been created.

trans-unit.source: Scan the QR code below with the Authenticator app or follow this link to start the activation process of the new token.
trans-unit.target: Scan the QR code below with the Authenticator app or follow this link to start the activation process of the new token.

trans-unit.source: Your token has been successfully paired. In order to use it, you must activate it first.
trans-unit.target: Your token has been successfully paired. In order to use it, you must activate it first.

trans-unit.source: You do not have permissions to enable the token
trans-unit.target: You do not have permissions to enable the token

trans-unit.source: You do not have permissions to disable this token.
trans-unit.target: You do not have permissions to disable this token.

trans-unit.source: Confirm authentication requests on your Smartphone with the Authenticator app
trans-unit.target: Confirm authentication requests on your Smartphone with the Authenticator app

trans-unit.source: Use the Authenticator app to scan QR code authentication requests
trans-unit.target: Use the Authenticator app to scan QR code authentication requests

trans-unit.source: Generate OTPs from your mobile device given a secret password and a custom pin
trans-unit.target: Generate OTPs from your mobile device given a secret password and a custom pin

trans-unit.source: Claim an existing token and link it to your user account. You need to know its serial number in advance.
trans-unit.target: Claim an existing token and link it to your user account. You need to know its serial number in advance.

trans-unit.source: Enter the serial number of the token you want to link to your user account.
trans-unit.target: Enter the serial number of the token you want to link to your user account.

trans-unit.source: Enter a description for your token.
trans-unit.target: Enter a description for your token.

trans-unit.source: The token was successfully linked to your user account.
trans-unit.target: The token was successfully linked to your user account.

trans-unit.source: The token was assigned to you, but an error ocurred while setting the description.
trans-unit.target: The token was assigned to you, but an error ocurred while setting the description.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem while creating the new token. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: There was a problem while creating the new token. Please try again.

trans-unit.source: The token was successfully created, but an error ocurred while setting the description.
trans-unit.target: The token was successfully created, but an error ocurred while setting the description.

trans-unit.target: You need an OATH compatible soft-token app installed on your mobile device to use this kind of token, such as:

trans-unit.source: Claim an existing token and link it to your user account
trans-unit.target: Claim an existing token and link it to your user account

trans-unit.source: Please try again or contact an administrator.
trans-unit.target: Please try again or contact an administrator.

trans-unit.source: The token is already assigned to you or to another user. Please contact an administrator.
trans-unit.target: The token is already assigned to you or to another user. Please contact an administrator.

trans-unit.source: The token you want to assign is not valid (wrong realm). Please contact an administrator.
trans-unit.target: The token you want to assign is not valid (wrong realm). Please contact an administrator.

trans-unit.source: Your session timed out, please login again.
trans-unit.target: Your session timed out, please login again.

trans-unit.source: Token could not be synchronized. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Token could not be synchronized. Please try again.

trans-unit.source: mOTP pin could not be set. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: mOTP pin could not be set. Please try again.

trans-unit.source: Pin could not be set. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Pin could not be set. Please try again.

trans-unit.source: Stop setting up your new token?
trans-unit.target: Stop setting up your new token?

trans-unit.source: The incomplete token will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: The incomplete token will be deleted.

trans-unit.source: You will have to restart the setup process in order to use this type of token.
trans-unit.target: You will have to restart the setup process in order to use this type of token.

trans-unit.source: The selected token type cannot be added at the moment.
trans-unit.target: The selected token type cannot be added at the moment.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem starting the token test, please try again later.
trans-unit.target: There was a problem starting the token test, please try again later.

trans-unit.source: Login failed: you do not have a second factor set up. Please contact an admin.
trans-unit.target: Login failed: you do not have a second factor set up. Please contact an admin.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem selecting the token. Please try again or contact an admin.
trans-unit.target: There was a problem selecting the token. Please try again or contact an admin.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem starting your token test.
trans-unit.target: There was a problem starting your token test.

trans-unit.source: Please wait some time and try again later, or contact an administrator.
trans-unit.target: Please wait some time and try again later, or contact an administrator.

trans-unit.source: The test failed. Check if the OTP is correct or try again.
trans-unit.target: The test failed. Check if the OTP is correct or try again.

trans-unit.source: You won't be able to use it to authenticate yourself anymore.
trans-unit.target: You won't be able to use it to authenticate yourself anymore.

trans-unit.source: Error: could not reset failcounter. Please try again or contact your administrator.
